code: @Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("seda:start").onException(Exception.class).redeliveryDelay(0).retryWhile(method("myRetryBean")).end().recipientList(header("recipientListHeader")).parallelProcessing().to("mock:result").             from("direct:foo").to("log:foo").to("mock:foo").         }     }. }
